glsa.title: GD: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GD, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: GD is a graphic library for fast image creation.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GD. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All gd users should upgrade to the latest version:
